long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your Canvas experience with CanvasU, the ultimate extension combining the best features of BetterCanvas and Tasks for Canvas into one seamless tool. Designed to enhance productivity and streamline your workflow, CanvasU offers a powerful suite of features tailored for both educators and students.

NOTE: RELOAD CANVAS AFTER INSTALLING

CanvasU is a merge of BetterCanvas and Tasks for Canvas. Credit for the parts of the extension that belong to them goes to the relative developer.

View BetterCanvas here: https://diditupe.dev/bettercanvas/
View Tasks For Canvas here: https://www.tasksforcanvas.info/

Contact: tinklyllc@gmail.com
